Members of City Council 
Newberg is governed by a seven-member City Council. Follow the links with the pictures below to learn more about the
City's Mayor and each of the City Councilors. To locate your residence with a District, use the interactive Council District Map.
For more information regarding City Council, e-mail cityrecorder@newbergoregon.gov

Council District Map
C

Councilor Derek Carmon

Position: District 6
Term: 2023-2026 Read More
derek.carmon@newbergoregon.gov https://www.newbergoregon.gov/business_detail_T2_R8.php

Councilor Elise Yarnell Hollamon

Position: District 1
Term: 2025-2028 Read More
elise.yarnell@newbergoregon.gov https://www.newbergoregon.gov/business_detail_T2_R3.php

Councilor Jeri Turgesen

Position: District 3
Term: 2026-2028 Read More
jeri.turgesen@newbergoregon.gov https://www.newbergoregon.gov/business_detail_T2_R6.php

Councilor Mike McBride

Position: District 5
Term: 2025-2028 Read More
mike.mcbride@newbergoregon.gov https://www.newbergoregon.gov/business_detail_T2_R9.php

Councilor Peggy Kilburg

Position: District 2
Term: 2023-2026 Read More
peggy.kilburg@newbergoregon.gov https://www.newbergoregon.gov/business_detail_T2_R5.php

Councilor Robyn Wheatley

Position: District 4
Term: 2023-2026 Read More
robyn.wheatley@newbergoregon.gov https://www.newbergoregon.gov/business_detail_T2_R7.php
M

Mayor Bill Rosacker

Position: Mayor
Term: 2023-2026 Read More
bill.rosacker@newbergoregon.gov https://www.newbergoregon.gov/business_detail_T2_R2.php
